⚖️ Make Cloud Research Connect Fairer for Everyone!

✨ Features:

    🔍 Visual Alerts: Instantly spot researchers with questionable histories.
    👥 Community Insights: Access shared experiences from other participants.
    ⚡ Real-Time Updates: Receive the latest reports instantly.
    🚩 One-Click Reporting: Easily flag problematic researchers.
    🔗 Detailed Info: Understand why researchers are flagged, with helpful Reddit links.

🤝 Join our community-driven effort to improve Cloud Research Connect for all participants!

🔥🦊 Version: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/crc-helper
